items.title: TUELONG Aerospace Technology Engineering JSC
items.text:
Intro day: 08/17/2017

Address: Nguyen hamlet, Tien Hung village, Nguyen Khe commune, Dong Anh district, Hanoi city, Vietnam

items.title: Vision
texts: Building a strong company in terms of organization and management closely, dynamically and actively integrate domestic and international economy with  advanced modern technology and preserve production capacity.
By 2020, become an internationally recognized Cabin interior maintenance service provider.
By 2025, become ASIA Cabin interior maintenance service provider; accredited by EASA / FAA as Cabin Interior maintenance organization.

items.title: Mission
texts: Sustainable development, ensuring sufficient jobs and income for employees, gradually improving and improving. Establish a mechanism for distributing business and production results in a strict and strict manner, ensuring benefits among laborers, enterprises, the state and society.
Diversify products, maintain existing products and partners. Research new products, improve and improve the quality of industrial designs; Branding products and corporate brands.
Proactive domestic and international economic cooperation; Economic production development must ensure sustainability, safety and efficiency.
